Details: After you spend AP to make an attack, may pay 1 essence to make an attack from the same range and opposite origin category.
After you hit a creature with an attack, you may shift once. Resolves before Companion attack.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Followup attack may be from opposite range category. If you do, gain advantage on that attack.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Start of turn, can choose companion, host or neither. Chosen has advantage on all attacks, other has disadvantage.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
